1118:4: arakṣite kuto bhogaḥ kiṃ dattaṃ yanna bhujyate ||5||
1118:6: uktaṃ hi bodhisattvaprātimokṣe-paraṃ śāriputra rakṣiṣyāmītyātmā rakṣitavyaḥ |
1118:7: evaṃrūpayā śāriputra hitaiṣi[ka]tayā samanvāgato bodhisattvo jīvitahetorapi pāpaṃ karma na karotīti ||
1118:9: tathā akṣayamatisūtre'pi-kāyaduḥkhatayā ca na parikhidyate sattvāvekṣitayeti ||
1118:12: yathoktamāryagaṇḍavyūhe āryaśrīsaṃbhavena-kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu |
1118:19: tasmāttarhi kulaputra evaṃ manasikārāt pratipraśrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇyupasaṃkramitavyāni |
1118:20: pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhāravahanā pariṇamanatayā vajrasamacittena anābhedyāśayatayā cakravālasamacittena sarvaduḥkhāsaṃpravedhanatayā |
1118:35: atraiva acalopāsikāvimokṣe varṇitam-kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīpratipannasya kulaputra bodhisattvasya buddhā bhagavanto'bhirāddhacittā bhavanti |
1118:39: ata evāryasudhanaḥ sāradhvajasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya anikaśatasahastrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sāradhvajaṃ bhikṣumavalokya praṇipatya punaḥ punaravalokayan niyataṃ praṇipatan namasyannavanaman manasi kurvan cintayan bhāvayan paribhāvayannudānamudānayan hākkāraṃ kurvan guṇānabhimukhīkurvannigamayan atrasannanusmaran dṛḍhīkurvannavijahan manasāgamayannupanibadhnan praṇidhiṃ samavasaran darśanamabhilaṣan svaranimittamudgṛhṇan yāvattasyāntikātprakrāntaḥ ||
1118:40: tathā kalyāṇamitrāgatāṃ sarvajñatāṃ saṃpaśyannaśrumukho rudan yāvanmeghasya dramiḍasyāntikātprakrāntaḥ ||
1118:41: bodhisattvapratimokṣe'pyuktam-iha śāriputra bodhisattvo dharmakāmatayā nāsti talloke ratnaṃ yanna parityajati |
1118:52: ugradattaparipṛcchāyāmapyuktam-sacetpunargṛhapate pāṭhasvādhyāyārthiko bodhisattvaḥ kasyacidantikāccatuṣpādikāṃ gāthāṃ śṛṇuyāduddiśedvā udgṛhṇīyāddānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāsaṃprayuktāṃ bodhisattvasaṃbhāropacayaṃ vā,
1118:53: tena tasminnācārye dharmagauravaṃ karaṇīyaṃ yāvadbhirnāmapadavyañja[na].... gāthoddiṣṭā |
1118:60: tatra tasyāntarāpaṇamadhyagatasyaitadabhūtyannvahamimamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya anena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kuryām |
1118:61: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahastrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni vikrītāni |
1118:62: punaraparimāṇe saṃsāre'parimāṇāni yāni mayā kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānamanubhūtāni |
1118:65: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'ntarāpaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdamudīrayāmāsa,
1118:70: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān brāmhaṇagṛhapatikāṃstathā samupasthāpayāmāsa yathā taṃ ghoṣaṃ nāśrauṣuḥ |
1118:74: evaṃ cāvadat- aho batāsmākaṃ durlabhā lābhā ye vayamātmabhāvasyāpi kretāraṃ na labhāmahe |
1118:75: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakarūpeṇa yāvatsadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dīnamanā utkaṇṭhitamānaso'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ?
1118:76: sadāprarudita evamāha- ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayā imamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ |
1118:79: atha khalu sa māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat- na mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam |
1118:80: api tu khalu punaḥ piturme yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ |
1118:81: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena kṛtyaṃ lohitena cāsthimajjayā ca |
1118:83: atha khalu sadāpraruditasyaitadabhūt- lābhā me sulabdhāḥ,
1118:85: yanmayātmanaḥ krāyako labdho hṛdayasya rudhirasya cāsthimañjāyāśca |
1118:86: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramudittacittastaṃ māṇavakametadavocatdāsyāmi māṇavaka yena te ita ātmabhāvādarthaḥ |
1118:87: yāvatsadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ vidhvā lohitaṃ [nistrāvayati sma ] dakṣiṇaṃ coruṃ vidhvā nirmāsaṃ ca kṛtvā asthi mettuṃ kuḍayamūlamupasaṃkrāmati ||
1118:88: atha khalvanyatarā śreṣṭhidārikā upariprāsādatalagatā adrākṣīt sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvam |
1118:89: yāvatsā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvastenopasaṃkramyaitadavocat-kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputra evaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ kāraṇāṃ kārayasīti?
1118:90: yāvatsā darikā pūjāprayojanaṃ śrutvā punarāha-kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirniṣpatsyate?
1118:91: sa tāmetadavocat-sa dārike kulaputro mama prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣyati |
1118:93: tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
1118:95: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvametadavocat-āścarya kulaputra |
1118:97: ekaikasyāpi kulaputra evaṃrūpasya dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālikopamānapi kalpānevamātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ |
1118:99: api tu khalu kulaputra yena yena kṛtya tatte dāsyāmi suvarṇa vā maṇiṃ vā muktāṃ vā vaiḍūrya vā yāvat yena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ satkariṣyasi |
1118:100: yāvadvistareṇa tayā dārikayā pañcaśataparivārayā sārdhaṃ tasya dharmodgatasya saṃkramaṇaṃ kartavyam ||
1118:101: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ utthāyāsanātsvakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat |
1118:103: sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sapta varṣāṇi na kāmavitarkamutpādayāmāsa,
1118:106: na rasagṛddhimutpādayāmāsa anyatra kadā nāma dharmodgatoo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyutthāsyati,
1118:107: yadvayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñāpayiṣyāmo yatrāsau kulaputro niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati |
1118:108: taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siktaṃ saṃmṛṣṭaṃ ca kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇam |
1118:110: tānyapi śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāṇi pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni dvābhyāmeveryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayāmāsuḥ |
1118:111: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyaṃ nirghoṣamaśrauṣīt-itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'smātsamāghervyutthāya madhye nagarasya niṣadya dharma deśayiṣyatīti |
1118:112: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayāmāsa |
1118:114: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaśca na codakaṃ samantātparyeṣamāṇo'pi labhate yena taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siñcet |
1118:115: yathāpi nāma māreṇa pāpīyasā tatsarvamudakamantardhāpitam- apyeva nāma asyodakamalabhamānasya cittaṃ duḥkhitaṃ syāddaurmanasyaṃ ca bhaveccittasya vā anyathātvaṃ bhavedyenāsya kuśalamūlāntardhānaṃ bhavenna vā bhrājeran kuśalamūlāni |
1118:116: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - yatrvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ vighvā imaṃ pradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam |
1118:119: mā rajodhāturito dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāye nipatatu |
1118:121: varaṃ khalu punarmamāyaṃ kāya evaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu,
1118:123: kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahastrāṇi punaḥ punaraparimāṇe saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni |
1118:126: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato vidhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarūdhireṇa sarvamasiñcat |
1118:128: na ca sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvamabhūt,
1118:130: ata evaṃ caturdharmakasūtre'pyuktam- kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvena yāvajjīvaṃ na parityaktavyamapi jīvitahetoriti ||
1118:136: teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisattvasamudācārā bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptānīti vacanāt |
1118:137: tasmāttadanīkṣaṇe mā bhūdāpattirāpannasyāpyajñānādaviratiriti sadā sūtradarśanāyādaraḥ kāryaḥ |
1118:138: tadanena kalyāṇamitrānutsargeṇa sūtrāntadarśanena ca sarvaḥ saddharmaparigraha ukto bhavati ||
1118:142: punaraparaṃ kulaputra ye te dharmabhāṇakā eṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ deśayitāraḥ pratipattisārāśca,
1118:143: teṣāmapi dharmabhāṇakānāṃ yatsevanaṃ bhajanaṃ paryupāsanamutthānamupasthānaṃ gauravaṃ citrīkāraḥ śuśraṣā ārakṣā parigrahaścīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāradānaṃ sādhukāradānaṃ svāmyārakṣā kuśalapakṣarakṣā varṇabhāṣaṇamavarṇapraticchādanatā,
1118:147: adharme dharmavādināṃ ca pudgalānāṃ saha dharmeṇa nigrahaḥ,
1118:151: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yo dharmaśravaṇahetuko vā dharmadeśanāhetuko va antaśa ekakramavyatihāraḥ,
1118:156: tasya yā nivāraṇā parirakṣā ekāgrībhāvo damaḥ śama upaśamo vinayaḥ,
1118:159: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yena dharmeṇa yo'dharmaḥ pravartate,
1118:166: tataśca so'pi na bodhisattva ityavaśyakāryaḥ saddharmaparigrahaḥ ||
1118:167: uktaṃ hi śrīmālāsiṃhanādasūtre- yānyapīmāni bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni bodhisattvapraṇidhānāni,
1118:170: punaratraivāha-syādyathāpi nāma devi mahābalavato'pi puruṣasyālpo'pi marmaṇi prahāro vedhanīyo bhavati bādhākaraśca,
1118:171: evameva devi mārasya pāpīyasaḥ parītto'pi saddharmapa[rigraho] vedhanīyo bhavati,
1118:173: nāhaṃ devi anyamekamapi dharma kuśalaṃ samanupaśyāmi mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ vedhanīyaṃ śokāvahaṃ paridevakaraṃ ca ,
1118:175: punarāha- syādyathāpi nāma devi sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvān kulaparvatānabhibhavannabhirocate ca samabhirocate coccatvena vipulatvena ca ,
1118:176: evameva devi mahāyānikasya kāyajīvitanirapekṣasya na cāgṛhītacittasya saddharmaparigraho navayānasaṃprasthitānāmapi kāyajīvitasāpekṣāṇāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmānabhibhavatītyādi ||
1118:183: sarvatra jātau ca jinaṃ sa paśyati |
